name: chromaconda
description:
~ ~ ~ c h r o m a c o n d a ~ ~ ~
It's like regular snake, except you have free movement and you have to capture pellets in a specific order.

Use arrow keys to move, avoid running into your tail and eating pellets of wrong colour.  Flashing pellets let you choose the next colour freely.

[Z] to change palette on main menu

[X] to reset back to the main menu

Made in ~48 hours as a first attempt at a Pico-8 project.

Follow me on Twitter
